description.translate:
You made him fly! He must have been so happy!$(n)Wish we had taught it how to land....it's broken now...
Luckily I was able to capture the spirits of all the sheep you so brutally murdered before they where taken by the $(b;winter)Winter Court$()! 
Now we can play with our fluffy friends from the sky, when ever we want! 

And we got a sleeping bag! Let's go on our Adventure!!
